# __Healthcare insurers__

## Risk affecting this stakeholder

* [Data storage and management challenges for the massive amount of data generated by iot devices in healthcare](https://github.com/mm80843/T3.5/blob/pages/Risk/PBN__Risk_14226.md)
* [Security and privacy concerns related to the data received from iot devices in healthcare](https://github.com/mm80843/T3.5/blob/pages/Risk/PBN__Risk_14228.md)

## This Stakeholder belongs to this Stakeholder Group

* [Health organisations](https://github.com/mm80843/T3.5/blob/pages/StakeholderGroup/PBN__StakeholderGroup_7.md)

## This Stakeholder belongs to this Stakeholder Subgroup

* [Private health organisations](https://github.com/mm80843/T3.5/blob/pages/StakeholderSubgroup/PBN__StakeholderSubgroup_25.md)
